Item.text: I think the answer is something like this.
I think I know a part of the answer.
And can you tell me more?
Is there anything else about that?
Alright. Could you elaborate on that a little?
I'm not so sure about that.
I don't think that is right.
Come on, I'm sure you can tell me something.
Come on, give me what you know.
Could you at least try to give me an answer? I really need your help.
_user_, can you please press on the correct answer choice?
_user_, can you please choose one and drag it to the blank?
Jordan, can you answer this question?
Jordan, you did not answer correctly.
Jordan, you didn't select the correct answer.
Jordan, you chose the wrong answer.
Jordan, you selected the wrong answer.
Sorry, neither of you were right.
Sorry, neither of you got the correct answer.
Jordan, nice, thats right. Great job.
Great job you two. You both got it correct!
You are both correct! Way to go!
Hi there. It's Cristina once again to tell you about the activities.
Good to see everyone again! Cristina, can you please tell us more about today's activity?

In this activity, you will answer questions about basic plot structure in narrative texts. For the purpose of the activity, we will be looking at simple stories instead of complex novels. After answering each question you will be given a piece of a story. You can fill in the blanks of the story to create your own version of the plot.
Wow, awesome! This sounds like fun.

Jordan, glad you think so. In order to fill in the blanks, you will press on one of the button options and drag that option to a blank area in the sentence. When the line under the blank turns green, you will know that your answer can be dropped into the sentence.
_user_, I think we can do this. Let's get to the first question!
Here is your finished story. You used your knowledge of how narrative texts are arranged to create your own story. You both did a great job and I hope you enjoyed this activity.
I certainly did. _user_ ,thanks for all your help. I look forward to seeing you next time.
Item.speech: I certainly did. _user_ thanks for all your help. I look forward to seeing you next time.

Question.text: Let's start developing the beginning of your story. What is one element that is usually introduced in the beginning of a story?

Answer.name: JordanAnswer1
Answer.text: I think it is A. You need to introduce the characters.
Answer.speech: I think it is eigh. You need to introduce the characters.

Answer.name: JordanAnswer2
Answer.text: I think it is B. You need to introduce the major event.

Answer.name: JordanAnswer3
Answer.text: I think it is C. You need to talk about the ending.
Answer.speech: I think it is Sea. you need to talk about the ending.

Answer.name: CristinaGood
Answer.text: The correct answer is A. Characters are typically introduced in the beginning of a story.
Answer.speech: The correct answer is eigh. Characters are typically introduced in the beginning of a story.

Answer.name: JordanTurn
Answer.text: Jordan, why don't you start this first round? Please press on either A, B, or C.

Answer.name: AskUser
Answer.text: _user_, what do you think the correct element is for the beginning of the story? Choose either A, B, or C.

Question.text: Now that you know how to begin your story, you can start by choosing two characters from the list below and drag them to the blanks. The two characters you choose will be your story's main characters.

Answer.name: JordanAnswer
Answer.text: Here is my selection.

Answer.name: CristinaDD
Answer.text: Good selection you two, these two will be your story's main characters. Now let's continue building your story!

Answer.name: JordanAgrees
Answer.text: _user_ I like your choice alot!
Answer.speech: _user_ I like your choice alot!

Answer.name: Temp
Answer.text: _user_ choose a character by dragging one of the choices to the blank.
Answer.speech: _user_ choose an answer!

Answer.name: JordanTurn
Answer.text: Jordan, what will you select for yours?

Answer.name: AskUser
Answer.text: _user_, go ahead, choose one.

Question.text: Ok, I have another question for both of you. what element describes when and where a story takes place? This element may change.
Question.speech: Ok, I have another question for both of you. what element describes when and where a story takes place? This element may change.

Answer.name: JordanAnswer2
Answer.text: I'm going to go for B. I think the setting needs to be introduced in the beginning of the story.
Answer.speech: I'm going to go for Bee. I think the setting needs to be introduced in the beginning of the story.

Answer.name: JordanAnswer4
Answer.text: I'm going to go for A. I think It's the ending with the problem solved.
Answer.speech: I'm going to go for, eigh. I think It's the ending with the problem solved.

Answer.name: JordanAnswer6
Answer.text: I'm going to go for C. I think it's the events leading to the major event.
Answer.speech: I'm going to go for, sea, I think it's the events leading to the major event.

Answer.name: CristinaGood
Answer.text: The correct answer is B. You need to establish the setting early on in the story, but the setting may change a lot as the story continues.
Answer.speech: The correct answer is B. You need to establish the setting early on in the story, but the setting may change a lot as the story continues.

Answer.name: JordanTurn
Answer.text: Jordan, what do you think?

Answer.name: AskUser
Answer.text: _user_, it's your turn, please choose either A, B, or C.

Question.text: Now that you know that you need to establish the setting we will select a time and place for the setting. _user_ please choose a place for the setting from the list below and drag them to the blanks. Jordan will select the time.
Question.speech: Now that you know that you need to establish the setting we will select a time and place for the setting._user_ please choose a place for the setting from the list below and drag them to the blanks. Jordan will select the time.

Answer.name: JordanAnswer
Answer.text: Here's what I'm going to choose.

Answer.name: CristinaDD
Answer.text: Nice settings you two, you two are being very creative!
Answer.speech: Nice settings you two, you are being very creative!

Answer.name: JordanAgrees
Answer.text: _user_, I think you chose very well!
Answer.speech: _user_ I think you chose very well!

Answer.name: JordanTurn
Answer.text: Jordan, what is your choice?

Answer.name: AskUser
Answer.text: _user_, which will you select?

Question.text: Now that you both have chosen a setting, let's continue. Here is another question about the composition of a story. What is the element early in the story that creates conflict for the characters?
Question.speech: Now that you both have chosen a setting, let's continue. Here is another question about the composition of a story. What is the element early in the story that creates connflict for the characters?

Answer.name: JordanAnswer1
Answer.text: I'm going to answer A. I think there needs to be a problem at the beginning of the story.
Answer.speech: I'm going to answer, eigh. I think there needs to be a problem at the beginning of the story.

Answer.name: JordanAnswer3
Answer.text: I think I'm going to answer B. I think this time, the major event needs to be at the beginning of the story.
Answer.speech: I think I'm going to answer, Bee. I think this time, the major event needs to be at the beginning of the story.

Answer.name: JordanAnswer5
Answer.text: I think I'm going to answer C. I think this time, it's the ending with the problem solved.
Answer.speech: I think I'm going to answer, Sea. I think this time, it's the ending with the problem solved.

Answer.name: CristinaGood
Answer.text: The correct answer is A. In the beginning of the story, there typically is a problem.
Answer.speech: The correct answer is, A. In the beginning of the story, there typically is a problem.

Answer.name: JordanTurn
Answer.text: Jordan, it's your turn.

Answer.name: AskUser
Answer.text: _user_, what is your answer?

Question.text: Now that you know that you must introduce a problem at the beginning of the story, _user_, please choose a problem from the list below and drag it to the blank.

Answer.name: JordanAgrees
Answer.text: _user_, great choice of a problem. I like how this story is coming together.
Answer.speech: _user_ Great choice of a problem. I like how this story is coming together.

Answer.name: CristinaDD
Answer.text: Yes, now we have an interesting problem. Let's go on.

Answer.name: AskUser
Answer.text: Go ahead.

Question.text: There have been a lot of events so far in the story. Can you tell me what happens at the most important point of the story?
Question.speech: There have been a lot of events so far in the story. Can you tell me what happens at the most important point of the story?

Answer.name: JordanAnswer2
Answer.text: I think it leads up to the major event. So C is correct.

Answer.name: JordanAnswer4
Answer.text: I think the answer is A. It would lead up to more problems.
Answer.speech: I think the answer is eigh. It would lead up to more problems.

Answer.name: JordanAnswer6
Answer.text: I think the answer is B. It leads up to the ending with the problem solved.
Answer.speech: I think the answer is Bee. It leads up to the ending with the problem solved.

Answer.name: CristinaGood
Answer.text: The correct answer is C. When something happens that complicates the problem it leads up to a major event.
Answer.speech: The correct answer is Sea. When something happens that complicates the problem it leads up to a major event.

Answer.name: JordanTurn
Answer.text: Jordan, what is your answer?

Answer.name: AskUser
Answer.text: _user_, it's your turn to answer. Press either A, B, or C.

Question.text: Now we know that a major event must follow the problem. let's read the middle of the story. _user_, please choose a major event from the list below and drag it to the blank.
Question.speech: Now we know that a major event must follow the problem. let's read the middle of the story, _user_, please choose a major event from the list below and drag it to the blank.

Answer.name: JordanAgrees
Answer.text: _user_, your major event is brilliant!
Answer.speech: _user_, your major event is brilliant!

Answer.name: CristinaDD
Answer.text: _user_, great choice of major event! Let's move on to the ending of your story.
Answer.speech: _user_ Great choice of major event! Let's move on to the ending of your story.

Question.text: can you tell me what happens at the end of a story?
Question.speech: can you tell me what happens at the end of a story?

Answer.name: JordanAnswer1
Answer.text: Oh I know, A. It's where the problem is solved!
Answer.speech: Oh I know! eigh! It's where the problem is solved!

Answer.name: JordanAnswer3
Answer.text: Oh I know, B. It's where the major event occurs!
Answer.speech: Oh I know! Bee! it's where the major event occurs!

Answer.name: JordanAnswer4
Answer.text: Oh I know, C. It's where the problem occurs!
Answer.speech: Oh I know! Sea! it's where the problem occurs!

Answer.name: CristinaGood
Answer.text: The correct answer is A. The ending of the story is where the problem is finally solved.
Answer.speech: The correct answer is, eigh. The ending of the story is where the problem is finally solved.

Answer.name: JordanTurn
Answer.text: Jordan, it's your turn. Choose A, B, or C.

Answer.name: AskUser
Answer.text: _user_, what about you? What do you think happens at the end of a story? Press on either A, B, or C.

Question.text: Now that you know what the ending of a story is, we need an ending for your story. _user_, please select an ending and drag it to the blank.
Question.speech: Now that you know what the ending of a story is, we need an ending for your story. _user_, please select an ending and drag it to the blank.

Answer.name: JordanAgrees
Answer.text: _user_, you picked a pretty good ending.
Answer.speech: _user_ You picked a pretty good ending.

Answer.name: CristinaDD
Answer.text: Great ending, and a good way to resolve the story's problem.

Answer.name: AskUser
Answer.text: Go ahead.

Question.text: Before we look at your finished story, let's come up with a title for it. I think this will complete the basic writing structure for your story. _user_, why don't you give the story a title?

Answer.name: AskUser
Answer.text: Please choose one from the options below.
